review: Fire stick works good, some volume/sound problems with Amazon movies.

review: No Vudu is a deal breaker for me.

review: Amazingly simple to use and we love it! Going to buy another one very soon!!

review: The stick works just like the regular version. This was purchased as a internet hook up for a remote TV in a bedroom,  when the TV,s internal internet connection stopped working.  Very easy to hook up,  Sets up immediately by it's self.  We love the Fire TV.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love, love, love our fire stick!
author: stephanie mitchell
